SELECT m.*, mr.role_id AS memberRole FROM Message m JOIN MemberRole mr ON m.memberId = mr.memberId WHERE m.roomId = #{roomId} AND m.type = 'TALK' order by regdate desc
select roomId from messageRoom where roomId = #{roomId}

SELECT m.roomId, m.memberId, mr.roomName FROM Message m JOIN MessageRoom mr ON m.roomId = mr.roomId WHERE m.type = 'ENTER' AND m.roomId IN ( SELECT roomId FROM Message WHERE type = 'TALK' GROUP BY roomId HAVING COUNT(type) >= 2 ) AND m.regdate = ( SELECT MIN(regdate) FROM Message WHERE roomId = m.roomId ) order by regdate desc
